p: For the eugenol compound in the bacterial population of S. aureus 75MR, a bacteriostatic effect was observed at MIC level and a bactericidal effect in MBC at the first hour of exposure. For the populations of E. coli 128 MR and C. albicans, a bactericidal or fungicidal effect was observed on MIC level at 2 h and 4 h, respectively ( Figure 1aâ€“c).
